0.text: Innate: Upon taking  fatal damage, Sion enters  stasis for 1.5 seconds to  reanimate into a frenzy, restoring 100% of his maximum health but losing 2 − 19 (based on level) health every 0.264 seconds, increasing by「 70% of the base value 」「 1.4 − 13.3 (based on level) 」per subsequent tick. Sion's  health regeneration and any  healing (except life steal) he receives during this time is 0% effective.
0.html: Innate: Upon taking fatal damage, Sion enters stasis for 1.5 seconds to reanimate into a frenzy, restoring 100% of his maximum health but losing 2 − 19 (based on level) health every 0.264 seconds, increasing by「 70% of the base value 」「 1.4 − 13.3 (based on level) 」per subsequent tick. Sion's  health regeneration and any healing (except life steal) he receives during this time is 0% effective.
markedPassages: fatal damage
stasis
reanimate
2 − 19 (based on level) health
「 70% of the base value 」「 1.4 − 13.3 (based on level) 」
「 1.4 − 13.3 (based on level) 」
1.4 − 13.3 (based on level)
health regeneration
healing

1.text:
Sion can only move and use his basic attacks and item actives, and empowers himself with the following effects:
 1.75 attack speed minimum and maximum
 100% life steal
Deals bonus physical damage  on-hit equal to 10% of the target's maximum health, capped at 75 against non-champions
 Ghosting
One cast of  Death Surge, which replaces all of his abilities
1.html:
Sion can only move and use his basic attacks and item actives, and empowers himself with the following effects:

  •  1.75 attack speed minimum and maximum
  •  100% life steal
  • Deals bonus physical damage on-hit equal to 10% of the target's maximum health, capped at 75 against non-champions
  • Ghosting
  • One cast of Death Surge, which replaces all of his abilities
markedPassages: 1.75 attack speed
100%
on-hit
Ghosting
Death Surge

2.text: Sion's damage to structures is reduced to 40% under the effects of Glory in Death.
2.html: Sion's damage to structures is reduced to 40% under the effects of Glory in Death.

0.text:
Active: Sion gains  67% bonus movement speed(bug) that decays over 2.376 seconds.
Once at least one ability has been learned, Death Surge can be cast using any ability key, even for the abilities that haven't been learned yet.
0.html:
Active: Sion gains  67% bonus movement speed(bug) that decays over 2.376 seconds.

Once at least one ability has been learned, Death Surge can be cast using any ability key, even for the abilities that haven't been learned yet.
markedPassages: 67% bonus movement speed
possibleConcerningAbilities: Once at least one ability has been learned, Death Surge can be cast using any ability key, even for the abilities that haven't been learned yet.

0.text: Active: Sion  charges for up to 2 seconds to increase Decimating Smash's  range over an area,  knock up duration,  stun duration, and damage every 0.25 seconds, which has up to a maximum bonus for the base damage and up to a 200% bonus for the scaling damage.
0.html: Active: Sion charges for up to 2 seconds to increase Decimating Smash's  range over an area, knock up duration, stun duration, and damage every 0.25 seconds, which has up to a maximum bonus for the base damage and up to a 200% bonus for the scaling damage.
markedPassages: charges
range
knock up
stun

1.text: Decimating Smash can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards. If the charge is  interrupted, Decimating Smash is placed on a  2-second cooldown.
1.html: Decimating Smash can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards. If the charge is interrupted, Decimating Smash is placed on a  2-second cooldown.
markedPassages: interrupted
2-second

2.text: Recast: Sion flails his axe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 50% for 0.25 seconds. Decimating Smash deals 150% damage against  monsters and 60% damage against  minions.
2.html: Recast: Sion flails his axe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 50% for 0.25 seconds. Decimating Smash deals 150% damage against monsters and 60% damage against minions.
markedPassages: slowing
monsters
minions

3.text: If Decimating Smash was charged for at least 1 second, Sion instead slams his axe down in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit,  knocking them up for 0.5 − 1 (based on channel time) seconds, and  stunning them for 1.25 − 2.25 (based on channel time) seconds.
3.html: If Decimating Smash was charged for at least 1 second, Sion instead slams his axe down in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit, knocking them up for 0.5 − 1 (based on channel time) seconds, and stunning them for 1.25 − 2.25 (based on channel time) seconds.
markedPassages: knocking them up
stunning

0.text: Passive: Sion gains  4 bonus health whenever he kills an enemy, increased to 15 for large enemies and  takedowns against enemy  champions.
0.html: Passive: Sion gains  4 bonus health whenever he kills an enemy, increased to 15 for large enemies and takedowns against enemy champions.
markedPassages: 4 bonus health
takedowns
champions

1.text: Active: Sion grants himself a  shield that lasts for up to 6 seconds. Soul Furnace can be recast after 3 seconds while the shield holds, and does so automatically at the end of the duration.
1.html: Active: Sion grants himself a shield that lasts for up to 6 seconds. Soul Furnace can be recast after 3 seconds while the shield holds, and does so automatically at the end of the duration.
markedPassages: shield

2.text: Recast: Sion consumes the shield to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 400 against  minions and  monsters.
2.html: Recast: Sion consumes the shield to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 400 against minions and monsters.
markedPassages: minions
monsters

3.text: Both of Soul Furnace's casts can be activated during Sion's other abilities.
3.html: Both of Soul Furnace's casts can be activated during Sion's other abilities.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Both of Soul Furnace's casts can be activated during Sion's other abilities.

0.text: Active: Sion bellows a shockwave in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit,  slows them for 2.5 seconds and inflicts them with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Sion bellows a shockwave in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, slows them for 2.5 seconds and inflicts them with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: slows
20% armor reduction

1.text: If the target is a  minion or non-epic  monster, they are also  stunned for 0.75 seconds and  knocked back for up to 1350 units further, though not through terrain, applying Roar of the Slayer's effects to enemies they pass through as well as briefly granting  sight of the area around their trajectory.
1.html: If the target is a minion or non-epic monster, they are also stunned for 0.75 seconds and knocked back for up to 1350 units further, though not through terrain, applying Roar of the Slayer's effects to enemies they pass through as well as briefly granting sight of the area around their trajectory.
markedPassages: minion
monster
stunned
knocked back
sight

0.text: Active: Sion becomes  immune to crowd control and  ghosted and, after a brief delay,  charges forward in the direction of the cursor for up to 8 seconds, during which he is able to steer at a slow turn rate while automatically navigating his movement. Unstoppable Onslaught can be recast after 0.4 seconds during the channel.
0.html: Active: Sion becomes immune to crowd control and ghosted and, after a brief delay, charges forward in the direction of the cursor for up to 8 seconds, during which he is able to steer at a slow turn rate while automatically navigating his movement. Unstoppable Onslaught can be recast after 0.4 seconds during the channel.
markedPassages: immune to crowd control
ghosted
charges

1.text: The charge ramps up Sion's movement speed at the time of cast by 40 movement speed every 0.1 seconds, up to 950 total movement speed.
1.html: The charge ramps up Sion's movement speed at the time of cast by 40 movement speed every 0.1 seconds, up to 950 total movement speed.

2.text: At the end of the charge's duration, Sion  leaps forward 300 units, landing after 0.55 seconds and slamming the ground beneath him. Sion will stop upon colliding with an enemy champion or terrain during the charge, ending Unstoppable Onslaught with a slam. Crashing into terrain  stuns Sion for 0.5 seconds.
2.html: At the end of the charge's duration, Sion leaps forward 300 units, landing after 0.55 seconds and slamming the ground beneath him. Sion will stop upon colliding with an enemy champion or terrain during the charge, ending Unstoppable Onslaught with a slam. Crashing into terrain stuns Sion for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: leaps
stuns

3.text: Enemies hit by Sion's charge are dealt physical damage. The base damage increases by 0% − 166.67% (based on channel time) and the scaling increases by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).
3.html: Enemies hit by Sion's charge are dealt physical damage. The base damage increases by 0% − 166.67% (based on channel time) and the scaling increases by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).

4.text: Enemies, including  turrets, hit by the slam are dealt the same damage and are  slowed for 3 seconds. Enemies in a smaller radius are also  pulled towards Sion over 0.5 seconds and become  stunned after a brief delay for 0.25 − 1.75 (based on channel time) seconds.
4.html: Enemies, including turrets, hit by the slam are dealt the same damage and are slowed for 3 seconds. Enemies in a smaller radius are also pulled towards Sion over 0.5 seconds and become stunned after a brief delay for 0.25 − 1.75 (based on channel time) seconds.
markedPassages: turrets
slowed
pulled
stunned

5.text: Recast: Sion stops charging, causing him to leap forward and slam the ground beneath him as if Unstoppable Onslaught had reached the end of its duration.
5.html: Recast: Sion stops charging, causing him to leap forward and slam the ground beneath him as if Unstoppable Onslaught had reached the end of its duration.

Sion's  health regeneration and any  healing (except life steal) he receives during this time is 0% effective.

textContent.html: Active: Sion grants himself a shield that lasts for up to 6 seconds. Soul Furnace can be recast after 3 seconds while the shield holds, and does so automatically at the end of the duration.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Sion grants himself a  shield that lasts for up to 6 seconds. Soul Furnace can be recast after 3 seconds while the shield holds, and does so automatically at the end of the duration.

textContent.text: Recast: Sion consumes the shield to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 400 against  minions and  monsters.
textContent.html: Recast: Sion consumes the shield to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 400 against minions and monsters.

skillTabs.concerningText: Recast: Sion consumes the shield to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 400 against  minions and  monsters.

textContent.text: Both of Soul Furnace's casts can be activated during Sion's other abilities.
textContent.html: Both of Soul Furnace's casts can be activated during Sion's other abilities.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Both of Soul Furnace's casts can be activated during Sion's other abilities.

concerningSkills.skillName: both of soul furnace's casts can be activated during sion's other abilities.

textContent.text: Active: Sion bellows a shockwave in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit,  slows them for 2.5 seconds and inflicts them with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.
textContent.html: Active: Sion bellows a shockwave in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, slows them for 2.5 seconds and inflicts them with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Sion bellows a shockwave in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit,  slows them for 2.5 seconds and inflicts them with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.
Active: Sion bellows a shockwave in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit,  slows them for 2.5 seconds and inflicts them with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.

textContent.text: If the target is a  minion or non-epic  monster, they are also  stunned for 0.75 seconds and  knocked back for up to 1350 units further, though not through terrain, applying Roar of the Slayer's effects to enemies they pass through as well as briefly granting  sight of the area around their trajectory.
textContent.html: If the target is a minion or non-epic monster, they are also stunned for 0.75 seconds and knocked back for up to 1350 units further, though not through terrain, applying Roar of the Slayer's effects to enemies they pass through as well as briefly granting sight of the area around their trajectory.

textContent.text: Active: Sion becomes  immune to crowd control and  ghosted and, after a brief delay,  charges forward in the direction of the cursor for up to 8 seconds, during which he is able to steer at a slow turn rate while automatically navigating his movement. Unstoppable Onslaught can be recast after 0.4 seconds during the channel.
textContent.html: Active: Sion becomes immune to crowd control and ghosted and, after a brief delay, charges forward in the direction of the cursor for up to 8 seconds, during which he is able to steer at a slow turn rate while automatically navigating his movement. Unstoppable Onslaught can be recast after 0.4 seconds during the channel.
markedPassages: immune to crowd control
ghosted
charges

textContent.text: The charge ramps up Sion's movement speed at the time of cast by 40 movement speed every 0.1 seconds, up to 950 total movement speed.
textContent.html: The charge ramps up Sion's movement speed at the time of cast by 40 movement speed every 0.1 seconds, up to 950 total movement speed.

textContent.text: At the end of the charge's duration, Sion  leaps forward 300 units, landing after 0.55 seconds and slamming the ground beneath him. Sion will stop upon colliding with an enemy champion or terrain during the charge, ending Unstoppable Onslaught with a slam. Crashing into terrain  stuns Sion for 0.5 seconds.
textContent.html: At the end of the charge's duration, Sion leaps forward 300 units, landing after 0.55 seconds and slamming the ground beneath him. Sion will stop upon colliding with an enemy champion or terrain during the charge, ending Unstoppable Onslaught with a slam. Crashing into terrain stuns Sion for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: leaps
stuns

textContent.text: Enemies hit by Sion's charge are dealt physical damage. The base damage increases by 0% − 166.67% (based on channel time) and the scaling increases by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).
textContent.html: Enemies hit by Sion's charge are dealt physical damage. The base damage increases by 0% − 166.67% (based on channel time) and the scaling increases by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).

skillTabs.concerningText: Enemies hit by Sion's charge are dealt physical damage. The base damage increases by 0% − 166.67% (based on channel time) and the scaling increases by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).
Enemies hit by Sion's charge are dealt physical damage. The base damage increases by 0% − 166.67% (based on channel time) and the scaling increases by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).

textContent.text: Enemies, including  turrets, hit by the slam are dealt the same damage and are  slowed for 3 seconds. Enemies in a smaller radius are also  pulled towards Sion over 0.5 seconds and become  stunned after a brief delay for 0.25 − 1.75 (based on channel time) seconds.
textContent.html: Enemies, including turrets, hit by the slam are dealt the same damage and are slowed for 3 seconds. Enemies in a smaller radius are also pulled towards Sion over 0.5 seconds and become stunned after a brief delay for 0.25 − 1.75 (based on channel time) seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Enemies, including  turrets, hit by the slam are dealt the same damage and are  slowed for 3 seconds. Enemies in a smaller radius are also  pulled towards Sion over 0.5 seconds and become  stunned after a brief delay for 0.25 − 1.75 (based on channel time) seconds.

markedPassages: turrets
slowed
pulled
stunned

textContent.text: Recast: Sion stops charging, causing him to leap forward and slam the ground beneath him as if Unstoppable Onslaught had reached the end of its duration.
textContent.html: Recast: Sion stops charging, causing him to leap forward and slam the ground beneath him as if Unstoppable Onslaught had reached the end of its duration.

2.concerningText: Active: Sion  charges for up to 2 seconds to increase Decimating Smash's  range over an area,  knock up duration,  stun duration, and damage every 0.25 seconds, which has up to a maximum bonus for the base damage and up to a 200% bonus for the scaling damage.

Active: Sion  charges for up to 2 seconds to increase Decimating Smash's  range over an area,  knock up duration,  stun duration, and damage every 0.25 seconds, which has up to a maximum bonus for the base damage and up to a 200% bonus for the scaling damage.

Active: Sion  charges for up to 2 seconds to increase Decimating Smash's  range over an area,  knock up duration,  stun duration, and damage every 0.25 seconds, which has up to a maximum bonus for the base damage and up to a 200% bonus for the scaling damage.

Recast: Sion flails his axe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 50% for 0.25 seconds. Decimating Smash deals 150% damage against  monsters and 60% damage against  minions.

Recast: Sion flails his axe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 50% for 0.25 seconds. Decimating Smash deals 150% damage against  monsters and 60% damage against  minions.

Recast: Sion flails his axe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 50% for 0.25 seconds. Decimating Smash deals 150% damage against  monsters and 60% damage against  minions.

Recast: Sion flails his axe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 50% for 0.25 seconds. Decimating Smash deals 150% damage against  monsters and 60% damage against  minions.

Enemies, including  turrets, hit by the slam are dealt the same damage and are  slowed for 3 seconds. Enemies in a smaller radius are also  pulled towards Sion over 0.5 seconds and become  stunned after a brief delay for 0.25 − 1.75 (based on channel time) seconds.

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Endure: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 − 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. active.originText: UNIQUE – SANDSWIPE:  Dash in a line through the target enemy champion's location, and upon completing the dash, deal 75 (+ 30% bonus AD) physical damage to the target and increase your damage dealt to them by 15% for the next 3 seconds (90 second cooldown; 500 range).
